result.title: First post!
result.content:
Hello everybody! I am LegendaryTooth, and I have lived for a decade. Well, actually I'm SpecialistTooth. I'm not legendary... yet.

Anyway, CodeForces is cool! I've been looking for a page where you could have programming challenges. And the best part is that we can interact with each other! It's like a programming version of Facebook. Friends, status updates, addicting...
